name: AVTECH CCTV Video
summary: Learn about .VSE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VSE files can be played back using Video Player, which is included with the Video Server E software. The application is also referred to as "AVTECH DVR Software / .VSE File Player."

description: Video recording file created by an AVTECH closed circuit television (CCTV) or digital video recorder (DVR); contains video saved in a proprietary format that can only be played back by the AVTECH software; used for saving and reviewing security videos.
